title: iMovie 10.0.9
description:
iMovie

With a streamlined design and intuitive editing features, iMovie lets you enjoy your videos and tell stories like never before. Browse your video library, share favorite moments, and create beautiful HD movies and Hollywood-style trailers. And with iCloud, you can enjoy them on all your devices in iMovie Theater.

Browse and share video
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ See all your video organized in one place
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly share a clip or a portion of a clip
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Background import lets you begin watching and sharing video instantly

Make Hollywood-style trailers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose from 29 trailer templates with stunning graphics and original scores by some of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s top film composers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize movie studio logos, cast names, and credits
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Select the best videos and photos for your trailer with the help of animated drop zones

Create beautiful HD movies
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose from 15 unique themes with matching titles and transitions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enhance your movie by adding titles, transitions, and 3D globes and travel maps
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Speed up and slow down the action with fast-forward and slow-motion effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drag one clip above another to create sophisticated picture-in-picture, side-by-side, and green screen effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use color-coded audio waveforms to find the right volume
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create a soundtrack using built-in music and sound effects, songs from your iTunes library, songs youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve recorded in GarageBand, and your own narration

Fine-tune every clip
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly improve the look and sound of your video using one-click Enhance
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Give your video a boost with easy-to-use color controls
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Stabilize shaky video for a smoother picture thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easier to watch
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically zoom in on faces and glide across panorama photos with the Ken Burns Effect
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Choose from 38 fun video and audio effects

Watch anywhere with iMovie Theater
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fill iMovie Theater with posters as you share clips, movies, and trailers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Access iMovie Theater on all your devices with iCloud
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enjoy iMovie Theater on your HDTV with Apple TV

Share with friends and family
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Email HD video with Mail Drop when signed in to iCloud
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Publish to YouTube,Vimeo, and CNN iReport
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export files using Custom H.264, ProRes, and Audio Only settings
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share any video frame as an image

iOS Developers: Create app previews for the App Store
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Import iPhone and iPad screen recording videos captured with QuickTime Player
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Highlight features with 11 animated titles designed to showcase apps in action
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export finished videos using the App Preview share option
